text:
"Berith" Maria Kristina Bohm (23 August 1932 – 14 May 2020) was a Swedish opera singer and actress. She performed in a talent show during her teens in Bromma and performed the song "Fjorton år tror jag visst att jag var".
She began her stage career in Stockholm and then went to Stora Teatern in Gothenburg. Her best known theatre role was as Csardasfurstinnan in "Sköna Helena". She also performed at Volksoper in Vienna, Austria.
Bohm died on 14 May 2020 at the age of 87.
